fullDescription.intro: This node searches for frequent molecular fragments in a set of molecules. This node reads in ARFF data from any URL. In the configuration dialog specify a valid URL and set a row prefix. A row ID will be generated by the reader in the form 'prefix + rownumber'. If no prefix is specified, the row ids are just the row numbers. Sparse ARFF files are currently not supported!

ports.dataOut: The data read from the file
